# theme_neo_x

```{r, echo=FALSE, messages=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
require(ggplot2)
require(nelsonthemes)
```

## Description

**theme_neo_x:** A simple but pretty production ready ggplot theme (x-axis). A recommended for time series simple but pretty production ready ggplot theme.

## Usage

```{r, eval=FALSE}
theme_neo_x()
```

## Value

A ggplot theme object

## Examples

```{r, messages=FALSE, warning=FALSE, dpi = 300}
library(nelsonthemes)
library(ggplot2)

# Converting nhtemp time series object to data frame
nhtemp <- data.frame(nhtemp = nhtemp, year = 1912:1971)

# Time Series/Line chart
ggplot(nhtemp, aes(y = nhtemp, x = year)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_neo_x() +
  labs(
    title = "Average Yearly Temperatures in New Haven",
    subtitle = "New Haven, Connecticut (1912-1971)",
    x = "Year",
    y = "Temperature"
  )
```
